title: Altrincham
name: Goose Green
content: An evening in the Goose Green area is recommended. This compact historic area retains its cobbled street around a statue of a goose and is home to various restaurants and bars; on warm evenings the client√®le use the open air facilities to drink (and smoke) outside. Altrincham Cinema is a short distance away and many cinema goers stop for a drink before and after the film.
